metadata.content: We Move Share the location of a walking, biking, or transit issues

home.tagline.one: Share the location of a walking, biking, or transit issue with our mobile app.
home.tagline.two: We Move is a web app created by Local Motion that allows you to share the location of a problem in your walking, biking, or transit network.
home.see.more.title: Youâ€™re the problem-solver.
home.see.more.description: We Move gathers crowdsourced information from people like you and creates a map of problem locations all over the city. Having a wider set of data shows patterns, and creates a much stronger case for advocates and neighbors to push for policy and infrastructure changes to improve walking, biking, and transit.
